title: PastaAlfredo
steps: Boil the pasta until al dente.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic.
Add cream and parmesan cheese, stirring until smooth.
Mix in the pasta and cook for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with additional cheese on top.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Heat oil in a wok.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté for a few seconds.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Pasta Alfredo
steps: Boil the pasta until al dente.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic.
Add cream and parmesan cheese, stirring until smooth.
Mix in the pasta and cook for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with additional cheese on top.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Chop all the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a pan and add garlic.
Add the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

title: Chicken Curry
steps: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in a pan until golden brown.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Mix in the spices and simmer with water for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or bread.

title: Mexican Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef with spices until fully cooked.
Warm the tortillas on a pan.
Fill each tortilla with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Fold and serve with salsa.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Boil spaghetti until al dente.
Fry bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and parmesan cheese together.
Mix the hot spaghetti with egg mixture and bacon.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mixture over the toast.
Serve immediately.

title: Smoothie Bowl
steps: Blend banana, strawberries, and yogurt until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola and honey.
Serve chilled.

title: Indian Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Cook chicken in butter until golden brown.
Blend tomatoes into a puree and cook with cream.
Add the cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with naan or rice.

title: Paneer Tikka
steps: Marinate paneer and bell peppers in yogurt, spices, and lemon juice.
Skewer and grill until charred.
Serve with mint chutney.

title: Chocolate Brownie
steps: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Mix in sugar, flour, and eggs.
Pour batter into a baking dish.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.
Let cool before serving.
